main event: A military aircraft reported sighting an elliptical object with a reddish glow in November 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes., The object resembled the top third of an inverted orange., There was no sound associated with the object., The object gradually faded away., Preliminary analysis suggests the sighting could be explained by a parallax phenomenon related to the moon.
witness description: crew members of a military aircraft from Prestwick, Scotland
